title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the project's objectives, functional and non-functional requirements for the contextually aware AI translation service.

title: Design Context Understanding Algorithm
description: Research and design an algorithm for the AI to understand and interpret the context of the source text.

title: Develop AI Model for Natural Language Processing
description: Develop or select a suitable AI model for natural language processing to handle the contextual understanding.

title: Integrate Translation API for Actual Text Translation
description: Select or develop a translation API to handle the actual text translation.

title: Develop User Interface for Input and Output Text
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to input the source text and view the translated output.
dependencies: Integrate Translation API for Actual Text Translation

title: Test and Validate the System Performance
description: Perform rigorous testing to validate the system's performance in terms of context understanding, translation accuracy, and user experience.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Input and Output Text

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Secure the system by implementing appropriate security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Input and Output Text
